item.description:
***The Wine List for the event has been published on the Boston Uncorked web site. Tickets still remain. There are no playoff or Red Sox games in town this night. The Tasting begins at 7pm. I always advise arriving early as most venues bring out the food early since there is a lot of wine to taste. Taking public transit is always the best route.***    

Boston Uncorked is turning SIX this year and is throwing a party to celebrate. Read on if you are ready for another great Wine Tasting from Boston Uncorked and purchase your tickets now. The last one sold out so this one should fill up fast.

The event will take place from 7:00 - 9:00 PM at the Back Bay Social Club on Boylston Street in the Back Bay. Members from my Red Sox Natives and Cathy's Boston Wine Meetup groups will also be joining us.

Expect an evening of fine food, wine and fun.

There will be a selection of fine wines from Bin Ends & Vinodivino.

The fine food will include:

Duck pastrami with wild mushroom mouse and aged balsamic

Social Slider-mini burger with sharp cheddar and smothered onions

Spanakopita-spinich and feta wrapped in phyllo

Lamb kibble with tzatziki and pita bread

Ceasar chicken skewers with rosemary

Smoked salmon on bagel chips with lemon creme and chive

Stuffed pickle peppers-sharp provolone and prosciutto

House made chips with onion herb dip

Tickets are $39.00 per person. There are no Maybe RSVPs since you must purchase a ticket in advance.

To purchase your ticket go to www.bostonuncorked.com . Please do not call or contact the Back Bay Social Club.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at 6:45PM in the foyer at the bar or 7PM Inside.
item.why: We do several Boston Uncorked events every year and drinking buddies have asked to return.
item.name: Boston Uncorked 6th Anniversary Wine Tasting Party at The Back Bay Social Club
